history.proof: intros a l H. inversion H; subst. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: ordered_cons, ordered_one. - auto.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c a : A H : ordered [a] Unable to unify "ordered [?M1473]" with "ordered []".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c a, b : A l0 : list A H : ordered (a :: b :: l0) H2 : order a b H3 : ordered (b :: l0) Unable to unify "ordered (?M1473 :: ?M1474 :: ?M1475)" with "ordered (b :: l0)".

In environment A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c a, b : A l0 : list A H : ordered (a :: b :: l0) H2 : order a b H3 : ordered (b :: l0) Unable to unify "order ?M1473 ?M1475" with "ordered (b :: l0)".

original: intros a l H. inversion H; subst. - apply ordered_one. - apply ordered_cons. + apply order_trans with (b := b); auto. + auto.
